column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last night I had a meeting in the city .
#id=2
#text=I live about an hour train ride from the city .
#id=3
#text=I got ready in my house and walked out of my house leaving plenty of time to get to my meeting on time .
#id=4
#text=I had to refill my metrocard with more money for the train fare .
#id=5
#text=They have raised the train fares again .
#id=6
#text=I enter the train station , payed for my metrocard at a machine , and walked down the stairs to wait for my train .
#id=7
#text=I need to take two trains so I will switch for another train at another stop .
#id=8
#text=My train arrives quickly and I manage to get a seat because it was n't too busy .
#id=9
#text=After getting off the first train and switching for another train 45 minutes later , I arrived at the destination and was on time for the meeting .
#text=Now I have to repeat the commute home after the meeting and hope it will be as smooth .
